title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, November 8, 2021
description: "In a weak moment, I have written a book." said Margaret Mitchell of her epic novel “Gone With the Wind.” She was born on this day in 1937.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: "In a weak moment, I have written a book." said Margaret Mitchell of her epic novel “Gone With the Wind.” She was born on this day in 1937.
